note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share of the population with bipolar disorder, males vs. females
subtitle: Estimated share of males versus females who have [bipolar disorder](#dod:bipolar_disorder), whether or not they are diagnosed, based on representative surveys, medical data, and statistical modelling.

display.name: Share of males with bipolar disorder
